title: ranked que bug???
body:
so wanting to rank with four people
one player in gold 3 last season, one in gold 4, one in silver 1, one in silver 2. the que wont let us que up because gold 3 and silver 2 are too far apart in ranked (more than 1 tier) but they aren't??? help

replies.body: Were they the same rank at the end of season 5?  I believe that if they were a lower (or higher) tier at the end of last season, that is what the new system takes into account.

Hey

The ranks that you mention - are these the ranks as of yesterday (preseason)?  Or the ranks you had at the end of Season 5 (November)?

Cheers
Mindstar
